Eiffel LSP for VS Code
======================

This installer will set up:

1. simple_lsp.exe - The Eiffel Language Server
2. VS Code extension - Syntax highlighting and LSP integration

After installation, open VS Code with any folder containing
Eiffel (.e) files to start using the LSP features:

  - Hover over identifiers for documentation
  - Ctrl+Click to go to definitions
  - Ctrl+Space for code completion
  - Ctrl+Shift+O for document outline
  - Ctrl+T to search all symbols

Requirements:
  - Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  - VS Code 1.75 or later

No additional dependencies required - everything is included!
